Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 37th overall pick, by Boston in 2016...
Injured on 6/17/2017 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 8/10/2017 with a Jammed Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/5/2018 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Traded from Boston to Cincinnati on 2/1/2019 (Going to BOS: SS Santiago Collado, P Juan Cardoso. Going to CIN: 1B Raul Rivera, LF Cedrick Fernandez)...
Traded from Cincinnati to San Francisco on 3/2/2019 (Going to SF: 2B John Losey, P Deangelo Barragan, 1B Raul Rivera, P George Mundell. Going to CIN: SS Wayne Weaver, C Kenneth Opitz)...
Had first career hit on 5/26/2019, off Demetrio Kabas (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/24/2019, off Isaac Baker (MON)...
Injured on 9/1/2019 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/2022, hitting .526 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
